problem_names:
lemma first_countable_topology_transfer_h: 
  "(\<forall>i. B i \<subseteq> Collect (Domainp A) \<and> x \<in> B i \<and> \<tau> (B i)) =
    (B ` Collect top \<subseteq> {Aa. Aa \<subseteq> Collect (Domainp A)} \<and> 
    (\<forall>i. x \<in> B i \<and> \<tau> (B i)))"

lemma first_countable_topology_transfer[transfer_rule]:
  assumes [transfer_rule]: "bi_unique A" "right_total A"
  shows 
    "((rel_set A ===> (=)) ===> (=)) 
      (first_countable_topology_ow (Collect (Domainp A))) 
      class.first_countable_topology"

lemma countable_basis_transfer[transfer_rule]: 
  assumes [transfer_rule]: "bi_unique A" "right_total A"
  shows 
    "((rel_set A ===> (=)) ===> rel_set (rel_set A) ===> (=)) 
      (countable_basis_ow (Collect (Domainp A))) countable_basis"

lemma second_countable_topology_transfer[transfer_rule]:
  assumes [transfer_rule]: "bi_unique A" "right_total A" 
  shows 
    "((rel_set A ===> (=)) ===> (=)) 
      (second_countable_topology_ow (Collect (Domainp A))) 
      class.second_countable_topology"
translations:
lemma first_countable_topology_transfer_h: 
  "(\<forall>i. B i \<subseteq> Collect (Domainp A) \<and> x \<in> B i \<and> \<tau> (B i)) =
    (B ` Collect top \<subseteq> {Aa. Aa \<subseteq> Collect (Domainp A)} \<and> 
    (\<forall>i. x \<in> B i \<and> \<tau> (B i)))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<forall>i.
        B i \<subseteq> Collect (Domainp A) \<and>
        x \<in> B i \<and> \<tau> (B i)) =
    (B ` Collect top
     \<subseteq> {Aa. Aa \<subseteq> Collect (Domainp A)} \<and>
     (\<forall>i. x \<in> B i \<and> \<tau> (B i)))

lemma first_countable_topology_transfer[transfer_rule]:
  assumes [transfer_rule]: "bi_unique A" "right_total A"
  shows 
    "((rel_set A ===> (=)) ===> (=)) 
      (first_countable_topology_ow (Collect (Domainp A))) 
      class.first_countable_topology"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((rel_set A ===> (=)) ===> (=))
     (first_countable_topology_ow (Collect (Domainp A)))
     class.first_countable_topology

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((rel_set A ===> (=)) ===> (=))
     (\<lambda>\<tau>.
         topological_space_ow (Collect (Domainp A)) \<tau> \<and>
         (\<forall>x\<in>Collect (Domainp A).
             \<exists>B.
                (\<forall>i.
                    B i \<subseteq> Collect (Domainp A) \<and>
                    x \<in> B i \<and> \<tau> (B i)) \<and>
                (\<forall>S.
                    S \<subseteq> Collect (Domainp A) \<and>
                    \<tau> S \<and> x \<in> S \<longrightarrow>
                    (\<exists>i. B i \<subseteq> S))))
     (\<lambda>open.
         class.topological_space open \<and>
         (\<forall>x.
             \<exists>A.
                (\<forall>i. x \<in> A i \<and> open (A i)) \<and>
                (\<forall>S.
                    open S \<and> x \<in> S \<longrightarrow>
                    (\<exists>i. A i \<subseteq> S))))

proof (prove)
goal (15 subgoals):
 1. Transfer.Rel (rel_set A ===> rel_set A ===> ?Rt30) ?am30 (\<subseteq>)
 2. Transfer.Rel ((?Rj30 ===> ?Rt30) ===> ?Rr30) ?al30 Ex
 3. Transfer.Rel (?Rh30 ===> rel_set A ===> ?Rs30) ?ak30 (\<in>)
 4. Transfer.Rel ((=) ===> ?Rs30 ===> ?Rq30) ?aj30 (\<and>)
 5. Transfer.Rel (?Rq30 ===> ?Rr30 ===> ?Rp30) ?ai30 (\<longrightarrow>)
 6. Transfer.Rel ((rel_set A ===> ?Rp30) ===> ?Rm30) ?ah30 All
 7. Transfer.Rel (?Rh30 ===> rel_set A ===> ?Ro30) ?ag30 (\<in>)
 8. Transfer.Rel (?Ro30 ===> (=) ===> ?Rn30) ?af30 (\<and>)
 9. Transfer.Rel ((?Rj30 ===> ?Rn30) ===> ?Rl30) ?ae30 All
 10. Transfer.Rel (?Rl30 ===> ?Rm30 ===> ?Rk30) ?ad30 (\<and>)
A total of 15 subgoals...

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>\<tau>.
        topological_space_ow (Collect (Domainp A)) \<tau> \<and>
        (\<forall>x\<in>Collect (Domainp A).
            \<exists>B.
               (\<forall>i.
                   B i \<subseteq> Collect (Domainp A) \<and>
                   x \<in> B i \<and> \<tau> (B i)) \<and>
               (\<forall>S.
                   S \<subseteq> Collect (Domainp A) \<and>
                   \<tau> S \<and> x \<in> S \<longrightarrow>
                   (\<exists>i. B i \<subseteq> S)))) =
    (\<lambda>open.
        topological_space_ow (Collect (Domainp A)) open \<and>
        (\<forall>x\<in>Collect (Domainp A).
            \<exists>Aa\<in>{f. f ` {x. x \<in> UNIV}
                                \<subseteq> {Aa. Ball Aa (Domainp A)}}.
               (\<forall>i\<in>{x. x \<in> UNIV}.
                   x \<in> Aa i \<and> open (Aa i)) \<and>
               (\<forall>S\<in>{Aa. Ball Aa (Domainp A)}.
                   open S \<and> x \<in> S \<longrightarrow>
                   (\<exists>i\<in>{x. x \<in> UNIV}. Aa i \<subseteq> S))))

by 
    (
      simp,
      unfold Ball_Collect, 
      intro ext, 
      unfold first_countable_topology_transfer_h
    ) 
    (metis top_set_def)

tts_context
  tts: (?'a to U)
  rewriting ctr_simps
  substituting first_countable_topology_ow_axioms
  eliminating \<open>?U \<noteq> {}\<close> through simp
begin

tts_lemma countable_basis_at_decseq:
  assumes "x \<in> U"
    and "\<And>A. 
      \<lbrakk>
        range A \<subseteq> Pow U; 
        \<And>i. \<tau> (A i); 
        \<And>i. x \<in> A i; 
        \<And>S. \<lbrakk>S \<subseteq> U; \<tau> S; x \<in> S\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>\<^sub>F i in sequentially. A i \<subseteq> S
      \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> thesis"
  shows thesis
    is first_countable_topology_class.countable_basis_at_decseq
subsection\<open>Topological space with a countable basis\<close>

locale countable_basis_ow = 
  topological_space_ow U \<tau> for U :: "'at set" and \<tau> +
  fixes B :: "'at set set"
  assumes is_basis: "topological_basis_ow U \<tau> B"
    and countable_basis: "countable B"
begin

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. B \<subseteq> Pow U

lemma countable_basis_transfer[transfer_rule]: 
  assumes [transfer_rule]: "bi_unique A" "right_total A"
  shows 
    "((rel_set A ===> (=)) ===> rel_set (rel_set A) ===> (=)) 
      (countable_basis_ow (Collect (Domainp A))) countable_basis"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((rel_set A ===> (=)) ===> rel_set (rel_set A) ===> (=))
     (countable_basis_ow (Collect (Domainp A))) countable_basis

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y xa ya.
       \<lbrakk>(rel_set A ===> (=)) x y; rel_set (rel_set A) xa ya\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> countable_basis_ow (Collect (Domainp A)) x xa =
                         countable_basis y ya
fix \<tau> :: "'a set \<Rightarrow> bool" and \<tau>' :: "'b set \<Rightarrow> bool" and B B'

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y xa ya.
       \<lbrakk>(rel_set A ===> (=)) x y; rel_set (rel_set A) xa ya\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> countable_basis_ow (Collect (Domainp A)) x xa =
                         countable_basis y ya

assume \<tau>\<tau>'[transfer_rule]: "(rel_set A ===> (=)) \<tau> \<tau>'" 
    and BB'[transfer_rule]: "rel_set (rel_set A) B B'"

proof (state)

  rel_set (rel_set A) B B'

       \<Longrightarrow> countable_basis_ow (Collect (Domainp A)) x xa =
                         countable_basis y ya

tts_context
  tts: (?'a to U)
  rewriting ctr_simps
  substituting countable_basis_ow_axioms
  eliminating \<open>?U \<noteq> {}\<close> through auto
  applying [OF B_ss_PowU]
begin

tts_lemma open_countable_basis_ex:
  assumes "X \<subseteq> U" and "\<tau> X"
  shows "\<exists>B'\<in>Pow (Pow U). B' \<subseteq> B \<and> X = \<Union> B'"
    is countable_basis.open_countable_basis_ex

tts_lemma countable_dense_exists:
  "\<exists>D\<in>Pow U. 
    countable D \<and> 
    (\<forall>X\<in>Pow U. \<tau> X \<longrightarrow> X \<noteq> {} \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>d\<in>D. d \<in> X))"
    is countable_basis.countable_dense_exists

tts_lemma open_countable_basisE:
  assumes "X \<subseteq> U"
    and "\<tau> X"
    and "\<And>B'. \<lbrakk>B' \<subseteq> Pow U; B' \<subseteq> B; X = \<Union> B'\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> thesis"
  shows thesis
    is countable_basis.open_countable_basisE

tts_lemma countable_dense_setE:
  assumes "\<And>D. 
    \<lbrakk>D \<subseteq> U; countable D; \<And>X. \<lbrakk>X \<subseteq> U; \<tau> X; X \<noteq> {}\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>x\<in>D. x \<in> X\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> thesis"
  shows thesis
    is countable_basis.countable_dense_setE

locale second_countable_topology_ow = 
  topological_space_ow U \<tau> for U :: "'at set" and \<tau> +
  assumes second_countable_basis:
    "\<exists>B\<subseteq>Pow U. countable B \<and> (\<forall>S\<subseteq>U. \<tau> S = generate_topology_on B U S)"

lemma second_countable_topology_transfer[transfer_rule]:
  assumes [transfer_rule]: "bi_unique A" "right_total A" 
  shows 
    "((rel_set A ===> (=)) ===> (=)) 
      (second_countable_topology_ow (Collect (Domainp A))) 
      class.second_countable_topology"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((rel_set A ===> (=)) ===> (=))
     (second_countable_topology_ow (Collect (Domainp A)))
     class.second_countable_topology

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((rel_set A ===> (=)) ===> (=))
     (\<lambda>\<tau>.
         topological_space_ow (Collect (Domainp A)) \<tau> \<and>
         (\<exists>B\<subseteq>Pow (Collect (Domainp A)).
             countable B \<and>
             (\<forall>S\<subseteq>Collect (Domainp A).
                 \<tau> S =
                 (in_topology_generated_by B on (Collect
            (Domainp A)) : \<guillemotleft>open\<guillemotright> S))))
     (\<lambda>open.
         class.topological_space open \<and>
         (\<exists>B. countable B \<and> open = generate_topology B))

proof (prove)
goal (8 subgoals):
 1. Transfer.Rel (?Rg13 ===> ?Rk13) ?af13 generate_topology
 2. Transfer.Rel ((rel_set A ===> (=)) ===> ?Rk13 ===> ?Rj13) ?ae13 (=)
 3. Transfer.Rel (?Rg13 ===> ?Ri13) ?ad13 countable
 4. Transfer.Rel (?Ri13 ===> ?Rj13 ===> ?Rh13) ?ac13 (\<and>)
 5. Transfer.Rel ((?Rg13 ===> ?Rh13) ===> ?Re13) ?ab13 Ex
 6. Transfer.Rel ((rel_set A ===> (=)) ===> ?Rd13) ?aa13
     class.topological_space
 7. Transfer.Rel (?Rd13 ===> ?Re13 ===> (=)) ?a13 (\<and>)
 8. (\<lambda>\<tau>.
        topological_space_ow (Collect (Domainp A)) \<tau> \<and>
        (\<exists>B\<subseteq>Pow (Collect (Domainp A)).
            countable B \<and>
            (\<forall>S\<subseteq>Collect (Domainp A).
                \<tau> S =
                (in_topology_generated_by B on (Collect
           (Domainp A)) : \<guillemotleft>open\<guillemotright> S)))) =
    (\<lambda>open.
        ?a13 (?aa13 open)
         (?ab13 (\<lambda>B. ?ac13 (?ad13 B) (?ae13 open (?af13 B)))))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>\<tau>.
        topological_space_ow (Collect (Domainp A)) \<tau> \<and>
        (\<exists>B\<subseteq>Pow (Collect (Domainp A)).
            countable B \<and>
            (\<forall>S\<subseteq>Collect (Domainp A).
                \<tau> S =
                (in_topology_generated_by B on (Collect
           (Domainp A)) : \<guillemotleft>open\<guillemotright> S)))) =
    (\<lambda>open.
        topological_space_ow (Collect (Domainp A)) open \<and>
        (\<exists>B\<in>{Aa. \<forall>Aa\<in>Aa. Ball Aa (Domainp A)}.
            countable B \<and>
            (\<forall>s\<subseteq>Collect (Domainp A).
                open s =
                (in_topology_generated_by B on (Collect
           (Domainp A)) : \<guillemotleft>open\<guillemotright> s))))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>\<tau>.
        topological_space_ow (Collect (Domainp A)) \<tau> \<and>
        (\<exists>B\<subseteq>{S. S \<subseteq> Collect (Domainp A)}.
            countable B \<and>
            (\<forall>S\<subseteq>Collect (Domainp A).
                \<tau> S =
                (in_topology_generated_by B on (Collect
           (Domainp A)) : \<guillemotleft>open\<guillemotright> S)))) =
    (\<lambda>open.
        topological_space_ow (Collect (Domainp A)) open \<and>
        (\<exists>B\<in>{Aa.
                         Aa \<subseteq> {Aa.
   Aa \<subseteq> Collect (Domainp A)}}.
            countable B \<and>
            (\<forall>s\<subseteq>Collect (Domainp A).
                open s =
                (in_topology_generated_by B on (Collect
           (Domainp A)) : \<guillemotleft>open\<guillemotright> s))))

tts_context
  tts: (?'a to U)
  rewriting ctr_simps
  substituting second_countable_topology_ow_axioms
  eliminating \<open>?U \<noteq> {}\<close> through (unfold topological_basis_ow_def, auto)
begin

tts_lemma ex_countable_basis:
  "\<exists>B\<in>Pow (Pow U). countable B \<and> (on U with \<tau> : \<guillemotleft>topological_basis\<guillemotright> B)"
    is Elementary_Topology.ex_countable_basis

tts_context
  tts: (?'a to U)
  rewriting ctr_simps
  substituting second_countable_topology_ow_axioms
  eliminating \<open>?U \<noteq> {}\<close> through (auto simp: countable_subset)
begin

tts_lemma countable_dense_exists:
  "\<exists>D\<in>Pow U. countable D \<and> (\<forall>X\<in>Pow U. \<tau> X \<longrightarrow> X \<noteq> {} \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>d\<in>D. d \<in> X))"
    is Elementary_Topology.countable_dense_exists

tts_lemma countable_dense_setE:
  assumes "\<And>D. 
    \<lbrakk>
      D \<subseteq> U; 
      countable D; 
      \<And>X. \<lbrakk>X \<subseteq> U; \<tau> X; X \<noteq> {}\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>d\<in>D. d \<in> X
    \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> thesis"
  shows thesis
    is Elementary_Topology.countable_dense_setE

tts_lemma Lindelof:
  assumes "\<F> \<subseteq> Pow U"
    and "\<And>S. \<lbrakk>S \<subseteq> U; S \<in> \<F>\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> \<tau> S"
    and "\<And>\<F>'. \<lbrakk>\<F>' \<subseteq> Pow U; \<F>' \<subseteq> \<F>; countable \<F>'; \<Union> \<F>' = \<Union> \<F>\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> thesis"
  shows thesis
    is Elementary_Topology.Lindelof

tts_lemma countable_disjoint_open_subsets:
  assumes "\<F> \<subseteq> Pow U" and "\<And>S. \<lbrakk>S \<subseteq> U; S \<in> \<F>\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> \<tau> S" and "disjoint \<F>"
  shows "countable \<F>"
    is Elementary_Topology.countable_disjoint_open_subsets
